document_data.caption2: The building in which Laskalan's Lamps and Lanterns was located.
document_data.name: Laskalan's Lamps and Lanterns
document_data.mainbody: '''Laskalan's Lamps and Lanterns''' was a small shop that repaired used and sold new lamps, lanterns, both with installed hidden compartments, wicks, [[lamp oil]], and [[candle]]s, located on [[Saerdoun Street]] in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Lamps and Lanterns shared a three-story-and-an-attic building with a number of other businesses. The building stood on the southern side of Saerdoun Street, three doors west from the intersection with [[Thunderstaff Way]]. Other tenants of the office building were [[Erro Alhandrar's Nets]], [[Demra Samdro's Best Beds]], [[Tantra Jaressra's Fine Gowns]], and [[Vressa's Sweep Begone]], as well as [[Tiger's Eye (shop)|Tiger's Eye]] at one point.
document_data.History: Laskalan's Lamps and Lanterns shop was established sometime before the building changed management in the {{YearlinkName|1494}}. The new landlord was the [[gnome]] named [[Hardyn Glorjarn]], who took over the building's attic.
